readable.title: 1077546505_a4f6c4daa9
readable.content: A boy in blue shorts slides down a slide into a pool . A boy in blue swimming trunks slides down a yellow slide into a wading pool with inflatable toys floating in the water . A boy rides down a slide into a small backyard pool . A boy sliding down a slide into a pool with colorful tubes . A child is falling off a slide onto colored balloons floating on a pool of water .
